name: Sreeja Nair
position: IIM-A Co'25 | NIFT (IR1) | Brand Management | E-commerce | Home Lifestyle & Fashion
about: Brand management expert with 8+ years in e-commerce, skilled in growing brands via innovative strategies and data-driven insights. Adept at leading initiatives in startups, with expertise in stakeholder management, marketing & process optimization.

current_company.name: Blanc9
current_company.title: IIM-A Co'25 | NIFT (IR1) | Brand Management | E-commerce | Home Lifestyle & Fashion

experience.title: Brand Manager
experience.description: •Stakeholder Management & Monitoring various verticals of: Operations, Cataloguing, Discounting, Merchandising & Digital marketing.•Directing Campaign shoots & planning creative content & campaigns for both verticals of Home-Furnishing & Fashion, across various PPC channels & other social media channels to maintain visibility & boost conversions.•Market/Trend analysis & Identifying Product gap to plan inventory and new seasonal assortments for both Marketplace and Brand website
experience.description_html: •Stakeholder Management & Monitoring various verticals of: Operations, Cataloguing, Discounting, Merchandising & Digital marketing.•Directing Campaign shoots & planning creative content & campaigns for both verticals of Home-Furnishing & Fashion, across various PPC channels & other social media channels to maintain visibility & boost conversions.•Market/Trend analysis & Identifying Product gap to plan inventory and new seasonal assortments for both Marketplace and Brand website <!---->

experience.title: Assistant Design Manager
experience.description: •Plan Visual content & conduct creative shoots for new product collections to pitch & expand the client base.Conduct research & plan mood boards / color pallets for the new seasonal collection and brief other designers•Identifying product gaps & implementing product cost-reduction strategies
experience.description_html: •Plan Visual content & conduct creative shoots for new product collections to pitch & expand the client base.Conduct research & plan mood boards / color pallets for the new seasonal collection and brief other designers•Identifying product gaps & implementing product cost-reduction strategies <!---->

experience.title: Team Lead / Senior Designer - Home Furnishing
experience.description: •Provide design Inputs on website aesthetics, functionality & visual content and plan / coordinate across various departments for the launch of a tailor-made MTM website.•Lead a team of designers to conceptualize a range of seasonal collections across various verticals like; print development, accessories /product development, wall-art, artworks etc.,•Design and handle bespoke projects from client briefing to functional design conversion
experience.description_html: •Provide design Inputs on website aesthetics, functionality & visual content and plan / coordinate across various departments for the launch of a tailor-made MTM website.•Lead a team of designers to conceptualize a range of seasonal collections across various verticals like; print development, accessories /product development, wall-art, artworks etc.,•Design and handle bespoke projects from client briefing to functional design conversion <!---->

experience.title: Brand Strategist
experience.description: •Conceptualize and establish brand identity across product, packaging and communication mediums.•Brand positioning and designing by range planning to maximize SKU range with minimum fabric hold.•Prototyping for the new website & planning the structural flow of its functionality
experience.description_html: •Conceptualize and establish brand identity across product, packaging and communication mediums.•Brand positioning and designing by range planning to maximize SKU range with minimum fabric hold.•Prototyping for the new website & planning the structural flow of its functionality <!---->

experience.title: Designer
experience.description: •SIS – Offline catalogue / range planning and close monitoring of performance across various styles & SKUs to apply dynamic pricing strategy for increasing sales•E-com catalogue and style planning across various marketplaces•	Planning visual content and managing photo-shoots for online cataloging as well as other high-end mood/banner shots•Product development for domestic LFS brands – Home town , @Home, Big Bazaar, Home Stop – IVY, Perfect Homes – Flipkart•Buyer/Vendor coordination & management for new developments of samples
